show_name: Hayate no Gotoku! Can't Take My Eyes Off You
other_title: Hayate the Combat Butler! Can't Take My Eyes Off You
Hayate the Combat Butler: Can't Take My Eyes Off You
ハヤテのごとく! CAN'T TAKE MY EYES OFF YOU
opening_theme: "CAN'T TAKE MY EYES OFF YOU" by eyelis
ending_theme: #1: "Koi no Wana (恋の罠)" by Haruka Yamazaki (ep 1-2, 4-11)
#2: "Yoki Shoujo no Tame no Pavane (善き少女のためのパヴァーヌ)" by Yamazaki Haruka (ep 3)
#3: "Here I am, Here we are" by Ryoko Shiraishi, Rie Kugimiya, and Haruka Yamazaki (Hayate Ayasaki, Nagi Sanzenin, and Ruka Suirenji) (ep 12)
